attributes.action: I wish to counter petition this petition for a new vote on brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Stats show the people wanting this petition are from london and scotland. The 2 that lost out. How can you implement a rule after the result.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that if the remain or leave vote is less than 60% based a turnout less than 75% there should be another referendum.

This is obsurd the majority has spoken. We cannot keep doing this when some dont get their way.
